docs.text: Docker Python for Postgres/Postgis Dockerfile model FROM python:3.7-stretch MAINTAINER ivan ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 COPY ./requirements.txt /requirements.txt RUN apt update && apt install postgresql-server-dev-all binutils libproj-dev gdal-bin -y RUN pip install -r /requirements.txt RUN mkdir /app WORKDIR /app COPY ./app /app RUN adduser --no-create-home user USER user
docs.title: docker
